com.google.thingbrowser.api
Interface MimeFacetFactory<T extends Facet>

public interface MimeFacetFactory<T extends Facet>

A MimeFacetFactory is an object provided by a Thing Browser plug-in that promises to decorate some Things, derived from a MIME resource, with a certain kind of Facet. For example, a Thing containing data of MIME type "text/html" may be decorated with an HtmlDomFacet.

Method Summary
 T createFacet(Thing thing)
          Create a Facet, as promised, for the specified Thing.
 java.lang.Class<? extends Facet> getFacetClass()
          The class of Facets which this factory can create.
 java.lang.String getMimeType()
          The MIME type, such as "text/html", that this factory requires.
 java.lang.String getUrlExtension()
          The URL extension, such as "html", that this factory requires.
 

Method Detail

getMimeType

java.lang.String getMimeType()
The MIME type, such as "text/html", that this factory requires. This takes precedence over getUrlExtension(). This property should be null if the factory is not interested in using it.

getUrlExtension

java.lang.String getUrlExtension()
The URL extension, such as "html", that this factory requires. This should NOT be prepended by a dot; an extension of "html" will automatically match URLs ending in "*.html", "pdf" matches "*.pdf", etc. This property should be null if the factory is not interested in using it.

getFacetClass

java.lang.Class<? extends Facet> getFacetClass()
The class of Facets which this factory can create.

createFacet

T createFacet(Thing thing)
Create a Facet, as promised, for the specified Thing.

Parameters:
thing - a Thing.
Returns:
the newly constructed Facet.
